column5: Went down with a couple buddies this morning. Man was it ever chilly, guess it was just what we needed to bring some fresh salmon and the odd rainbow up. Drifted roe for a good hour this morning with no luck at all. Picked up the casting rod started casting away. My buddy asks if he can try my rod with the roe on it two drifts later he nails the little bow   Anyways there are a few around i guess.
Cool 12footspringbok Nice way to start!!! Leechman
